title: Episode 12 Ft. Julia Beverly
itunes:title: Episode 12 Ft. Julia Beverly
description:
Julia Beverly, founder and creator of Ozone Magazine and the author of the newly published biography about "Sweet Jones: Pimp C's Trill Life Story" stops by Lip Service with hosts Angela Yee, Gigi Maguire and Stephanie Santiago. Julia brings one of the women featured in the book, Jada, who worked as an escort and worked for Love and Hip Hop's Mally Mall at one point. Jada describes her journey, gives some rules of the pimps and hoes game, and discusses cleanliness and one music mogul who forced another man
